---
title: "IMDB Movie Analysis"
output: html_document
params:
   min_year: 2005
   max_year: 2016
   imdb_score : 7
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
df <- read.csv("/Users/valantrahome/projects/data_science-r/movie_metadata.csv", header=TRUE)
library(dplyr)
data <- df %>% filter( title_year > params$min_year & title_year < params$max_year & imdb_score >= params$imdb_score)
```

## IMDB Movie Analysis

This my first analysis of IMDB data using dplyr and published via _R Markdown_

```{r data }
summary(data)
```
